info.description:
## Overview
This API provides functionality for managing pull requests and automatically assigning random reviewers from teams.

### Key Features:
- Create and manage pull requests
- Automatically assign 2 random reviewers from team members
- Manage team structures and user assignments
- Track pull request status and merge operations

### Authentication
This API uses JWT Bearer token authentication. Admin tokens have elevated privileges.
info.title: PR Review Assignment API

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
